Posts.Content: soccermom1963 wrote: I had BMX 4 days ago and am getting worried about the amount of swelling that I have. I feel as if I'm going to burst. The PS put in TEs and filled them about 300 ccs. I had 320 cc implants before so he thought this would be OK. I am getting worried that I have an infection or that they are going to swell so much that I burst the stitches. Help. Is this normal?
